text: You do not have an overdue balance at the moment. From your spending limit of $$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt, you currently do not have a balance owing on your account.
De votre limite de crédit de $session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $, vous n'avez actuellement aucun solde dû au compte.
You currently do not have a balance owing on your account.
Vous n'avez actuellement aucun solde dû sur votre compte.
<speak>This does include <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>
Ce solde inclut $session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $ de frais non facturé.

<speak>You do not have an overdue balance at the moment. From your spending limit of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, you currently have a credit balance of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody> on your account. This credit will be applied on your next bill once it comes out.</speak>

<speak>Vous n'avez pas de solde en retard présentement. De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, vous avez un solde en crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody> sur votre compte. Ce crédit sera appliqué sur votre prochaine facture une fois sortie.</speak>

<speak>You do not have an overdue balance at the moment. You currently have a credit balance of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.total_due</prosody> on your account. This credit will be applied on your next bill once it comes out.</speak>

<speak>Vous n'avez pas de solde en retard présentement. Vous avez actuellement un solde en crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.total_due $</prosody> sur votre compte. Ce crédit sera appliqué sur votre prochaine facture une fois sortie.</speak>
<speak>This amount includes, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>
<speak>Ce solde inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>

<speak>From your spending limit of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, your current total balance on the account of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody> is overdue.</speak>

<speak>De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, votre solde actuel au compte de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody> est en retard. Il était dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>Your current total balance of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.past_due_amt</prosody> is overdue as it was due by <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>Votre solde actuel au compte de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.past_due_amt $</prosody> est en retard. Il était dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>
<speak>This amount includes, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>
<speak>Ce solde inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>

<speak>You do not have an overdue balance at the moment. From your spending limit of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody>.</speak>

<speak>Vous n'avez pas présentement de solde en retard. De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, votre solde actuel au compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody>, et il est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>You do not have an overdue balance at the moment. Your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.total_due</prosody> due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>Vous n'avez pas présentement de solde en retard. Votre solde total actuel sur le compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.total_due $</prosody>, et il est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>
<speak>This amount includes <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>
<speak>Ce solde inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>
<speak>Your overdue balance is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.past_due_amt</prosody>.</speak>
<speak>Vous avez présentement un solde en retard de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.past_due_amt $</prosody>.</speak>
<speak>Your overdue balance is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.past_due_amt</prosody>.

<prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.current_due_amt</prosody> is due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>, which makes for a total of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.total_due</prosody> due on your account.</speak>
<speak>Vous avez présentement un solde en retard de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.past_due_amt $</prosody>.

<prosody rate=".80">$session.params.current_due_amt $</prosody> est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>, donc votre solde total est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.total_due $</prosody>.</speak>

<speak><prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.current_due_amt</prosody> is due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>, and there is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges from your current usage cycle, which makes for a total of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody> out of your, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody> credit limit.</speak>

<speak><prosody rate=".80">$session.params.current_due_amt $</prosody> est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>, et il y a, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé de votre cycle d'utilisation actuel, ce qui fait pour un total de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody> sur votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>.</speak>

<speak><prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.current_due_amt</prosody> is due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>,  which makes for a total of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody> out of your, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody> credit limit.</speak>

<speak><prosody rate=".80">$session.params.current_due_amt $</prosody> est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>, ce qui fait pour un total de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody> sur votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>.</speak>

<speak>From your spending limit of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody>.</speak>

<speak>De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, votre solde actuel au compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody>.</speak>
